channel.title: R Markdown on STA304 A1 DD
channel.description: Recent content in R Markdown on STA304 A1 DD

item.title: Exploring Opinions Towards Social Conflicts Using CES2000
item.description: I use R(R Core Team 2020) and R package tidyverse (Wickham et al. 2019) to do the analysis. i also used R package rmarkdown (Allaire et al. 2020, @crmd2) for editing. The data was obtained from cesR package (Hodgetts and Alexander 2020), specifically from ces2000 package(Blais et al. 2000). Code and data supporting this analysis is available at: “https://github.com/dding33/STA304”. Introduction Class of 2022, this is the data on the year when most of you were born!
